tool_description: Performs statistical analysis on geochemical and mineralogical data including descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, and outlier detection for geological interpretation.

sample_ids.description: Array of sample IDs to include in statistical analysis

statistical_tests.description: Statistical analyses to perform: descriptive, correlation, outliers, normality, clustering

outlier_method.description: Outlier detection method: iqr, zscore, or modified_zscore

error_messages: Insufficient samples: At least 3 samples are required for statistical analysis.
Invalid statistical_tests: Use one or more of [descriptive, correlation, outliers, normality, clustering].
Invalid outlier_method: Use one of [iqr, zscore, modified_zscore].
Missing analytical data: Some samples lack complete analytical data for the requested parameters.
usage: Provide sample_ids, analysis_parameters, and statistical_tests; optionally set confidence_level and outlier_method. The tool performs comprehensive statistical analysis.

descriptive_statistics.description: Mean, median, standard deviation, and range for each parameter

outlier_samples.description: Sample IDs identified as statistical outliers
